attributes.action: Help Medical graduates from the Czech republic to apply for F1 and F2 posts within the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Graduates who have gained a medical degree from the Czech republic of whom are British citizens should be allowed to apply for both 
F1 and F2 posts within the NHS. And not just restricted to F2 posts as these places are somewhat limited.
